CustomField.description: This is the 'state acronym' that is supplied from the OLS WebApp. It's values don't necessarily match that of an exact state acronym but the values supplied are SOLELY responsible for determine what welcome email template is used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the 'state acronym' that is supplied from the OLS WebApp. It's values don't necessarily match that of an exact state acronym but the values supplied are SOLELY responsible for determine what welcome email template is used.
CustomField.label: Supplied State Acronym
